content.text:
# 1983 Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation

The 1983 Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation () was held in January 1984. It was the first Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation ever held in Hong Kong.
Top 10 song awards
The top 10 songs (十大勁歌金曲) of 1983 are as follows.

|

* Composer: Lu Yongqiang
* Performed by: Kenny Bee
|-

|
